faqs.question: How much does a kitchen remodel typically cost in the UAE?
faqs.answer: It varies based on materials, size, and scope. Basic updates might start from AED 15,000, while high-end remodels can exceed AED 50,000. Providers on Homezy offer transparent quotes after reviewing your project.

faqs.question: Can I stay in my home during the kitchen renovation?
faqs.answer: Yes, but expect some disruption. Many providers on Homezy offer efficient timelines and phased renovations to minimize inconvenience.
